00014 #ifndef MAPRIGHTS_H
00015 #define MAPRIGHTS_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include <iostream>

00020 #include "PacketRW.h"

00022 class UserUser;
00023 class UserRight;
00024 
00031 class MapRights : public PacketRW {
00032 public:
00038    enum Rights {
00040       BASIC_MAP       = 0,
00041       // unused bits here 1-6
00042       TRAFFIC         = 7,
00043       SPEEDCAM        = 8, 
00044       // Ununsed bits 9-11
00045       FREE_TRAFFIC    = 12,
00046       // unused bits here 13-15
00047       FLEET           = 16,
00048       // unused bits here 17-22
00050       WF_TRAFFIC_INFO_TEST = 23,
00051       // Ununsed bits 24-26
00053       SCDB            = 27,
00054       DISABLE_POI_LAYER = 28,
00055    };
00056 
00060    enum Masks {
00062       ALL_TRAFFIC = ((1 << TRAFFIC ) |
00063                      (1 << FREE_TRAFFIC ) | 
00064                      (1 << WF_TRAFFIC_INFO_TEST ) ),
00065       TRAFFIC_AND_SPEEDCAM = ALL_TRAFFIC | 
00066                      (1 << SPEEDCAM ) |
00067                      (1 << SCDB ),
00068    };
00069 
00076    MapRights(enum Rights right);
00077 
00083    explicit MapRights(enum Masks right);
00084 
00089    MapRights();
00090 
00100    explicit MapRights( const MC2String& hexString );
00101 
00108    MapRights& setRight(const MapRights & right);
00109 
00116    MapRights& clearRight(const MapRights& right);
00117 
00126    const MapRights& operator&=(const MapRights& right);
00127 
00135    const MapRights& operator|=(const MapRights& right);
00136 
00144    const MapRights operator~() const;
00145 
00151    operator const void*() const;
00152 
00156    MC2String getName(LangTypes::language_t lang) const;
00157 
00164    size_t getSizeInPacket() const;
00173    bool save(Packet* packet,int& pos) const;
00183    bool load(const Packet* packet,int& pos);
00185 
00194    inline MapRights& filterMapRights();
00195 private:
00197    typedef uint64 bitset_type;
00199    bitset_type m_rights;
00204    explicit MapRights(const bitset_type& rights);
00205 
00206    //friend declarations. 
00207 
00208    friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& o, const MapRights& r);
00209    friend bool operator==(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs);
00210    friend bool operator<(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs);
00211    friend bool operator>(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs);
00212 };

00227 {
00228    return (lhs &= rhs);
00229 }
00230

00240 {
00241    return (lhs |= rhs);
00242 }
00244 
00257 inline bool operator!=(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs)
00258 {
00259    return ! (lhs == rhs);
00260 }
00261 
00270 inline bool operator<(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs)
00271 {
00272    return lhs.m_rights < rhs.m_rights;
00273 }
00274 
00282 inline bool operator>(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs)
00283 {
00284    return lhs.m_rights > rhs.m_rights;
00285 }
00286

00294 {
00295    return !(lhs > rhs);

00349 inline MapRights::MapRights(MapRights::Rights right) : 
00350    m_rights((1 << right))
00351 {}
00352 
00353 inline MapRights::MapRights(MapRights::Masks mask) :
00354    m_rights( mask )
00355 {}
00356 
00357 inline MapRights::MapRights() : 
00358    m_rights(0)
00359 {}

00362    m_rights(rights)
00363 {}

00365 inline MapRights& MapRights::setRight(const MapRights & right)
00366 {
00367    *this |= right;
00368    return *this;
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline MapRights& MapRights::clearRight(const MapRights& right)
00372 {
00373    *this &= ~right;
00374    return *this;
00375 }
00376 
00377 inline const MapRights& MapRights::operator&=(const MapRights& right)
00378 {
00379    m_rights &= right.m_rights;
00380    return *this;
00381 }
00382 
00383 inline const MapRights& MapRights::operator|=(const MapRights& right)
00384 {
00385    m_rights |= right.m_rights;
00386    return *this;
00387 }
00388 
00389 inline const MapRights MapRights::operator~() const
00390 {
00391    return MapRights(~m_rights);
00392 }
00393 
00394 inline bool operator==(const MapRights& lhs, const MapRights& rhs) 
00395 {
00396    return lhs.m_rights == rhs.m_rights;
00397 }
00398 
00399 inline MapRights::operator const void*() const
00400 {
00401    return m_rights ? this : NULL;
00402 }
00403 
00404 inline size_t MapRights::getSizeInPacket() const
00405 {
00406    return 8; //sizeof(bitset_type) as long as it is a uint64. 
00407 }
00408 
00409 inline MapRights& MapRights::filterMapRights()
00410 {
00411    MapRights tmp = ::filterMapRights(*this);
00412    *this = tmp;
00413    return *this;
00414 }
